info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Berkshire County through 430 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Adams, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... North Adams, Adams, Williamstown, Florida, New Ashford, Hairpin Turn, Greylock, Sweets Corner, Soldiers Memorial Field, Cheshire Harbor, Arnoldville, Maple Grove, Eastern Summit, Braytonville, Zylonite, Bowens Corners, Cole Field, Meadowvale, Whitcomb Summit and Noel Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
